# Sales versus Forecast

## Time series

```{r}
#| label: 'display sales'
#| eval: True

ACT <- 
  DYN[MATERIAL == MAT 
      # & FTYPE  == '1' 
      & CALMONTH %between% c('202401', '202412') 
      ] 

n_cols <- length(unique(paste(ACT$VTYPE, ACT$FTYPE)))
ET_COL <- pa_ET_COLS[1:n_cols]

ggplot(
  ACT, 
  aes(
    x      = CALMONTH, 
    y      = Q,
    color  = paste(VTYPE, FTYPE),
    group  = paste(VTYPE, FTYPE)
  )) +
  geom_line(
    linewidth = 2
    # colour   = "white"
    # position = "dodge"
  ) +
  labs(
    x     = "Month",
    y     = "Quantity EA", 
    title = paste("Sales of SKU:", pa_matn1_output(MAT), "per month"),
    color = "Legend"
  ) +
  scale_color_manual(
    # labels = c("Act.1", "Fct.1", "Act.2", "Fct.2"),
    values = pa_ET_COLS
  ) +  
  geom_label(aes(label = round(Q/1000, 1))) +
  guides(color = guide_legend(
    override.aes = 
      list(
        fill  = pa_ET_COLS,  
        color = pa_ET_COLS 
      )
  )
  ) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))
```

## Violin on Horizon

```{r}
#| label: 'violin plot of Forecast Accuracy'
#| eval: true

# ACC_BCK <-  copy(ACC)
# ACC     <- copy(dtACC7)

VAR <- "EPA"

dtACC0 <- 
  dtACC7                                                       %>%
  pa_model_accuracy(
  .act_ftype = 1, .fct_ftype = 2
  )  
# %>%
#   .[, WGHT:= 0.2*ACT/max(ACT), by = .(CALMONTH, STEP)] %>%
#   .[CALMONTH >= '202401' & WGHT > 0.05 ]

dtACC0[, .(
  EPA = mean(EPA, na.rm = TRUE),
  APA = mean(APA, na.rm = TRUE)
  ), 
  by = .(STEP)]

# DT <- dtACC0[get(VAR) > 0,.(STEP, ACC = get(VAR), WGHT)]
DT <- dtACC0[,.(STEP, ACC = get(VAR), WGHT = 0.2)]


# Violin plot: STEP on x-axis (treat as discrete), ACC on y-axis
ggplot(DT, aes(x = factor(STEP), y = ACC)) +
  # Violin layer to show the distribution
  geom_violin(
    trim           = TRUE, 
    draw_quantiles = c(0.25, 0.5, 0.75),
    color          = "#089b35"
    ) +
  geom_jitter(
    aes(
      # size  = WGHT,
      alpha = WGHT/2
    ),
    height = 0, 
    width  = 0.25, 
    color  = "#38e56d"
    # ,
    , size   = 0.2
    # alpha  = 0.3
    ) +
  # Optional: a summary point for the mean on each violin
  stat_summary(
    fun   = mean, 
    geom  = "point", 
    shape = 23,   # diamond shape
    size  = 3, 
    fill  = "#0f5e3c",
    color = "#0f5e3c"
  ) +
  labs(
    x     = "Step",
    y     = "Accuracy",
    title = glue("Distribution of Forecast Accuracy ({`VAR`}) by Step")
  ) +
  coord_cartesian(ylim = c(-100, 100))

```

```{r}
#| label:  'SC-113B for M-1, M-2, M-3'
#| eval:   true

dtFA_melt  <- 
  copy(ACC[STEP <4])                   %>%
  melt.data.table(
    measure.vars  = c("APA", "EPA"),
    variable.name = "PE_TYPE",
    value.name    = "PE"
    )                                  %T>% 
  setorder(CALMONTH)

ggplot(
  data = dtFA_melt[
    CALMONTH >='202401' & 
      MATERIAL == MAT   &  
      PE_TYPE == VAR], 
  aes(
    x     = CALMONTH, 
    y     = PE, 
    group = factor(STEP), 
    color = factor(STEP)
    )
  ) +
  geom_line(linewidth = 2) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_label(aes(label = round(PE, 1))) +
  scale_color_manual(
    labels = c("M-1", "M-2", "M-3"),
    values = c(pa_ET_COLS["CG"], pa_ET_COLS["FG"], pa_ET_COLS["LG"])) +
  labs(
    x     = "Year Month",
    y     = "Accuracy",
    title = glue("SC-113B {pa_matn1_output(`MAT`)} - Forecast Accuracy ({`VAR`}) M-1, M-2, M-3"),
    color = "Forecast Period"
  ) +
  guides(color = guide_legend(
    override.aes = 
      list(
        fill  = c(pa_pa_ET_COLSS["CG"], pa_ET_FG, pa_ET_COLS["LG"]), 
        color = c(pa_pa_ET_COLSS["CG"], pa_ET_FG, pa_ET_COLS["LG"])
      )
  )
  ) +
  coord_cartesian(ylim = c(0, 100)) +
  theme_minimal()
  
if(MAN){
  if(rstudioapi::showQuestion(
    title   = "SAC",
    message = "Do you want to open SC-113B?"
  ) == TRUE) {
    browseURL(url = "https://wessanen.eu10.sapanalytics.cloud/link/SC113B")
  }
}
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(ggrepel)

ggplot(
  data = dtFA_melt[
    CALMONTH >= '202401' & 
      MATERIAL == MAT &  
      PE_TYPE == VAR
  ], 
  aes(
    x     = CALMONTH, 
    y     = PE, 
    group = factor(STEP), 
    color = factor(STEP)
  )
) +
  geom_line(linewidth = 2) +
  geom_point() +
  # Instead of geom_label(), use geom_label_repel()
  geom_label_repel(aes(label = round(PE, 1)),
                   # optional parameters to tweak repel behavior
                   force         = 2,
                   max.overlaps  = Inf,
                   box.padding   = 0.3,
                   point.padding = 0.3
  ) +
  scale_color_manual(
    labels = c("M-1", "M-2", "M-3"),
    values = c(pa_pa_ET_COLSS["CG"], pa_ET_FG, pa_ET_COLS["LG"])
  ) +
  labs(
    x     = "Year Month",
    y     = "Accuracy Academic",
    title = glue("SC-113B {pa_matn1_output(`MAT`)} - Forecast Accuracy ({`VAR`}) M-1, M-2, M-3"),
    color = "Forecast Period"
  ) +
  guides(color = guide_legend(
    override.aes = list(
      fill  = c(pa_pa_ET_COLSS["CG"], pa_ET_FG, pa_ET_COLS["LG"]), 
      color = c(pa_pa_ET_COLSS["CG"], pa_ET_FG, pa_ET_COLS["LG"])
    )
  )) +
  coord_cartesian(ylim = c(25, 100)) +
  theme_minimal()

```
